summary:
Scenes that I would love to see in GoT S8:
-Jon Snow, after the reveal, seeking peace bathing in the hot pools in the...
body:
Scenes that I would love to see in GoT S8:

-Jon Snow, after the reveal, seeking peace bathing in the hot pools in the Godswood…

Dany searching for him and finding him.

Jon, being the #maidenindistress that he is, doing the typical nude scene that usually is reserved to women, when the beautiful girl exits from the water all naked and wet with water sloshing around. And while D&D and all the actors Kit included snicker at the fact that he plays the ultimate maiden-in-distress scene, I (and Dany) just stare wide eyed and wetter than the actual pools

🤗⛲

summary: Bastard Bonding
body:
Bastard Bonding

Pairing: Jon Snow x reader

Warnings: swearing, drinking

Summary: [the request itself] Could you do a Jon Snow x Reader, where the reader is the daughter of Jaime Lannister (but not Cercie’s)? Thank you if you get the time 🖤🖤

—

Your aunt Cersei had always hated you, for what, you could never understand, but your father Jaime had always stuck up for you and protected you; he told you that you were a bastard daughter, but that that should never make you feel as if you were any less his daughter. He wasn’t ever ashamed of you, which was incredibly rare, as most highborns would cast aside their bastards and walk away from them; but your father wasn’t like that, and when the Lannisters and Baratheons travelled to Winterfell, you joined them - something your aunt was disgusted about, and she didn’t bother to hide it, either. A feast was to be held upon the arrival of your family and King Robert’s, but despite both Jaime and your uncle Tyrion’s protests, you weren’t allowed to join in - you had to sit outside with the other bastard, Jon, Ned Stark’s son.

“Not allowed to join either?” He asked, looking at you with those big brown eyes and soft looking lips. Sat beside him, was a towering white wolf with crimson eyes, but despite its sheer size, it still looked quite young, like an overgrown puppy.

“No bastards allowed,” you said bitterly and solemnly. “Queen Cersei’s orders.”

“You shouldn’t talk ill of your aunt,” Jon told you with a slight titter; it was then that he reached behind him, and brought out a small flask. He offered it to you. “Here, drink this.”

“What is it?” You asked curiously.

“Wine,” he replied, chuckling with surprise when you snatched the flask and took a big gulp.

“Thank the gods…” you huffed out, wiping your lips and passing his flask back. “Sorry, I just… I needed a drink…”

“It’s fine,” he shrugged with a hum. “I take it you’re not a big fan of the Queen, then?”

“Absolutely the fuck not!” You scoffed. “My aunt hates me, and I hate her just as much… vile woman.”

“That’s something I’d never expect to hear from a Lannister,” Jon laughed softly.

“I’m not a Lannister,” you growled gently. “Jaime Lannister may be my father, but I’ll never wear the lion upon my armour… you seem decent, Jon, which is why I don’t want to snap, so can we stop talking about how we’re little more than bastards, please?”

“Sorry,” he said sincerely, his hand coming to rest upon your knee sweetly. “Say, how about I give you a tour of Winterfell?”

“I’d like that,” you agreed, leaning over and kissing his cheek sweetly; when you pulled back, his cheeks were flushed with pink, and you couldn’t help but to bite your lip and smile. “Thank you.”

summary: Sent To Me - toaquiprashippar - Game of Thrones (TV) [Archive of Our Own]
title: Sent To Me - toaquiprashippar - Game of Thrones (TV) [Archive of Our Own]
excerpt: An Archive of Our Own, a project of the Organization for Transformative Works
description:
Chapters: 10/?
Fandom: Game of Thrones (TV), A Song of Ice and Fire - George R. R. Martin, A Song of Ice and Fire & Related Fandoms
Rating: Mature
Warnings: Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings
Relationships: Jon Snow/Daenerys Targaryen, Lyanna Stark/Rhaegar Targaryen, Ashara Dayne/Ned Stark
Characters: Daenerys Targaryen, Rhaegar Targaryen, Jon Snow, Ned Stark, Robb Stark, Arya Stark, Sansa Stark, Rickon Stark, Catelyn Tully Stark, Arthur Dayne, Oswell Whent, Lyanna Stark, Ashara Dayne, Allyria Dayne, Edric “Ned” Dayne, Bran Stark, Theon Greyjoy, Petyr Baelish, Tywin Lannister, Jaime Lannister, Cersei Lannister
Additional Tags: I’ll give you more character tags if I continue this, Canon Divergence - Robert’s Rebellion, What Could Have Been, Rhaegar Lives, R plus L equals J, Alternate Universe - Canon Divergence, Not Exactly For Catelyn Fans
Summary:

He found a reason to live before he could let death claim him.
What he did not know was of the other reasons that could be found across the Narrow Sea.

Chapter 10

Some people are just not ready to hear the truth, some are.

I hope everyone enjoys this chapter, I had such a good time writing it! <333 

Beta’d by my angel @fairytalelovr <3

summary: Jon Snow loves redheads yeah?  :D
title: Jon Snow loves redheads yeah?  :D
body:
‘‘she looks lovely,Jon thought . Lonely and lovely  Ygritte had been pretty in her own way, with her red hair kissed by fire , but it was her smile that made her face come alive. Val did not need to smile; she would have turned men’s heads in any count in the wide world’‘- Jon about Val (ADWTD)

‘’The light of the half-moon turned Vals honey-blond hair a pale silver and left her cheeks as white as snow. She took a deep breath. The air tastes sweet.’‘ _Jon about Val (ADWTD)


‘‘ A warrior princess, he decided, not some willowy creature who sits up in a tower, brushing her hair and waiting for some knight to rescue her ‘‘_ jon snow about Val (ADWD)

“What kind of Queen am I if I’m not willing to risk my life to fight them?’‘_ Daenerys  season 7 episode 4


‘‘she looks lovely,Jon thought . Lonely and lovely ‘’_ Jon about Val

“Off in the distance, a wolf howled. The sound made her feel sad and lonely, but no less hungry. As the moon rose above the grasslands, Dany slipped at last into a restless sleep.“ (ADWD - Dany)

‘‘ A warrior princess, he decided, not some willowy creature who sits up in a tower, brushing her hair and waiting for some knight to rescue her ‘‘_ jon snow about Val (ADWD)

“What kind of Queen am I if I’m not willing to risk my life to fight them?’‘_ Daenerys  season 7 episode 4


‘‘she looks lovely,Jon thought . Lonely and lovely ‘’_ Jon about Val

“Off in the distance, a wolf howled. The sound made her feel sad and lonely, but no less hungry. As the moon rose above the grasslands, Dany slipped at last into a restless sleep.“ (ADWD - Dany)

blog.name: noriereads

summary: GoT foreshadowing
title: GoT foreshadowing
body: Jon watched them leave, and Arya watched Jon. His face had grown as still as the pool at the heart of the godswood. Finally he climbed down off the window. “The show is done,” he said. He bent to scratch Ghost behind the ears. The white wolf rose and rubbed against him. “You had best run back to your room, little sister. Septa Mordane will surely be lurking. The longer you hide, the sterner the penance. You’ll be sewing all through winter. When the spring thaw comes, they will find your body with a needle still locked tight between your frozen fingers.”

summary: you must not balk, whatever is asked of you. do as they bid you... but in your heart, remember who and what you are. ride with...
caption: you must not balk, whatever is asked of you. do as they bid you... but in your heart, remember who and what you are. ride with them, eat with them, fight with them, for as long as it takes.

tags: It's all so shit and ooc
summary: “JON!”   Her shouts for him have him spurring faster, his baby sister needs him, and her screams of pain have him near...
body:
“JON!” 

Her shouts for him have him spurring faster, his baby sister needs him, and her screams of pain have him near hyperventilating. It is no surprise she knows he is coming, he has not been subtle in his approach, even with Jaime Lannister on the other end of Casterly Rock, trying to slow him down, Jon is faster, Tormund and Sandor Clegan following after.

This second part to Robert’s Rebellion has ended much the same as the other, Daenerys ensuring that all those of Baratheon blood are gone, and will not usurp Targaryen again. Arya’d been left to guard Cersei and her son for a time, Casterly Rock, the castle that Jon was already within, searching for his baby sister, her screams driving him, as he felled soldiers who stood in his way, ignored Lannister soldiers that moved out of his way. Only Tommen then stood, a boy hardened by the death of his sister, and for what reason Jon could not yet tell, raised his sword to Jon. Jon did not wish to strike the boy, but he would to get to Arya. 

“Get out of my way,” He near snarled. 

“You won't have the wolf girl,” Tommen replied, raising his chin high. “I promised her nothing would happen.” 

“JON!” She screeched again, hands fisting in bloodied tunic, crying as wave after wave of pain tore through her.  

“He won’t help you, girl, you know who he’s sided with,” Cersei Lannister’s words are harsh, but Arya fears they may be true, as she lays in her bed of blood. The former queen had been kind enough to help tend her, but Arya could not tell if she truly cared if she died or not, pain ripping through as she sobbed and sweat, dropping as her eyes rolled back into her head. 

“Breathe! Before you kill the both of you!” 

Though Tommen thought he mayhaps had been protecting Jon’s sister, he had kept him from her, even as she screamed for him. The boy had made to stop Jon, and though he was wont to do it, the youngest Lannister’s blood now stained The White Wolf’s sword, barging his way through the halls, hearing the footfalls of The Hound and Tormund behind him. 

“Arya!” 

“Jon!” He barrelled his shoulder through the door, greeted with the sight of Arya, sickly pale, in a bed of blood, and he was quick to her side, sword dropped in his haste. He pushed sweat soaked locks from her face, but she was pushing at him, gripping him by clothes. 

“Promise me, Jon, Promise me you will protect him!” Jon shakes his head, frowning as he does not understand until the cries of a babe pierce his ears, and he’s turning his head, spying Cersei Lannister, holding clothed but bloody babe within her arms, soothing him. She seems to not mind incurring his wrath, but clearly does not look the look of the babe, handing him to Jon. 

“It’s a boy,” She says, and her hair still hasn’t grown much, and though he has other things to think of, Cersei Lannister seems to know her end has come, knows that Tommen will not return to her. He can see in her eyes that she wishes to kill him for what he has done, but the babe in his arms seems to placate her only a moment. Jon knows it has everything to do with Cersei’s own mother.

Though the hair is brown, Jon knows that this baby is Baratheon blooded, and even with her love and care of Arya, Dany would have him killed as Robert had tried her. 

Arya’s hand weakly grips his arm, as Jon stares down at the babe, then her. “Protect him. Please, he must not know, she mustn’t…” Even in her final moments, she is defiant. 

“He is Snow. He is yours, please!” He’s not sure any would believe him, but he holds the boy close, squalling babe settling, though Arya does not reach for him, eyes flickering closed. 

“Arya, please…” 

“His name is Robb… Robb Snow and he is yours, not mine, not Gendry’s.. he is yours, please, promise me you will protect him.” He doesn’t want to, but Jon nods his head, pressing kiss to Arya’s forehead much as it pains him, holding onto her hand for a moment. 

“Arya-” 

“No. Don’t you know? The lone wolf dies, but the pack survives,” She’s reaching then, pulling Needle from beside the bed, and holding it in her arms. “Tell them I died with sword in my hands, and that.. the blood is from- not this… They cannot know.” Arya does not care for her own honour, and Jon sees it, it is only the boy’s. 

“I promise.” Promise me Jon, Promise me. 

The end of it all was so different than the first time, but all the same. The wolf girl in love, running from a proposed match. Aegon Targaryen, Jon’s half-brother, Dany’s nephew, would not get the wolf girl he had asked both for. The wolf had chosen the bull and not the dragon, and Jon would conceal it, as her father had done him. It was all the same, and yet entirely different. 

He is numb, as he leaves, Arya’s final breath still lingering, and Jon leaves Cersei for Jaime Lannister to deal with, but the sight of the babe has The Hound for once, seeming to care. “Fucks sake..” He says, even as Tormund frowns. 

He wouldn’t have his name, but this boy had his blood. Jon would call him his own, and pretend. He’d lie to Daenerys, and she would wonder, who Jon loved enough to betray her, but Jon would lie this once. They’d not known when Arya left, that she was with child, they would not know now she was gone. 

Robb Snow, Jon Snow’s bastard son. Unlike Ned Stark, Jon would someday tell the boy of his mother, but not until it was safe to do so.  For he had promised.

tags: i dont gove a shit about ships i care about my boi
summary: I’m gonna be perfectly
body:
I’m gonna be perfectly

Honest with you all. If Jon decides to go by Targaryen and forsake the Stark name or the Snow name it will be to most ooc thing ever.

Sure his father was a Targaryen but his mother was a stark he was raised by Starks in Winterfell and his name is Snow.

blog.name: chitowngirl-12
blog.title: Chicago Diva
blog.description: I'm a fan of Jon, the North, and the Starks.  Not a Jonsa, but an ally because they are nice, rational people unlike other parts of GOT fandom that will remain nameless.  (Apparently I'm also a sexist crazy person for having bad, ungood opinions about Daenerys Targaryen!  And I also set up alts and post anonymous comments and talk to myself on AO3...  Sarc off.  Yeah, fandom is pissing me off right now.)

tags: Thank you Dany I would kneel is how a servant addresses his mistress not how two equal monarchs talk with each other
Please stop using that stupid beach scene as evidence the two are equals
Dany never asks Jon for advice.  She bullies him as a servant
summary: So some Dany-stan @yocalio was yelling at me based on this quote: “ What?  That Jon is a submissive loser and Dany is a spoiled...
body:
So some Dany-stan @yocalio was yelling at me based on this quote:

“ What?  That Jon is a submissive loser and Dany is a spoiled brat.  Both are clear in that scene regardless of what you want to yell about canon.”

To which she posted this:

“ And yeah I’ll yell about canon till the cows come home because that’s what counts. And let me tell you, it’s not in your favor lol”

Even the Dany Stans know that Jon is a submissive loser and Daenerys is a spoiled brat.  And these characterizations are canon.

Oh, and can the Dany stans also please admit that that horrid Jon-Dany beach scene isn’t Jon giving Dany advice as a powerful, neutral agent but Jon attending to the woman who was holding him hostage as a docile servant and giving her gibberish.
